lessons.japanese: ６時の新幹線にまだ間に合うでしょうか。
lessons.english: Can we still catch the 6:00 Shinkansen?

lessons.japanese: 東北・秋田新幹線が運転を見合わせるなど交通も混乱した。
lessons.english: Traffic was also disrupted including the suspension of the Akita, Tohoku bullet train.

lessons.japanese: 東海道新幹線は１９６４年に完成した。
lessons.english: The New Tokaido Line was completed in 1964.

lessons.japanese: 新幹線なら、名古屋から東京もそんなに遠く感じないよ。
lessons.english: If you travel by Shinkansen, it doesn't seem far from Nagoya to Tokyo.

lessons.japanese: 新しい新幹線の速いこと！
lessons.english: How fast the new Shinkansen goes!

lessons.japanese: 次の新幹線は９時ちょうどに出ます。
lessons.english: The next Shinkansen train leaves at just nine o'clock.

lessons.japanese: 私達が乗った新幹線は１２時きっかりに発車した。
lessons.english: The bullet train we were on pulled out at 12 sharp.

lessons.japanese: ６時の新幹線にまだ間に合うでしょうか。
lessons.english: Can we still catch the 6:00 Shinkansen?

lessons.japanese: 私達が乗った新幹線は１２時きっかりに発車した。
lessons.english: The bullet train we were on pulled out at 12 sharp.

lessons.japanese: 次の新幹線は９時ちょうどに出ます。
lessons.english: The next Shinkansen train leaves at just nine o'clock.

lessons.japanese: 新しい新幹線の速いこと！
lessons.english: How fast the new Shinkansen goes!
